alert.note: Alert for Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Lamoille; Orleans; Washington; Western Addison; Western Chittenden (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 13 at 11:11AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...Light to Moderate Snow to Create Slippery Travel... As of 11 AM, light to moderate precipitation was falling across much northern and central Vermont. Much of this precipitation was snow, with rain seen in areas where the temperature is above freezing. As colder air moves southward, any rain will change over to snow. The snow will be heavy and wet, with a dusting to 2 inches of accumulation expected. A brief period of icing, with a glaze of ice, is also possible. Travel may be difficult due to greasy, snow covered roads and reduced visibility. Motorists are urged to use caution and remain alert for rapidly changing road conditions. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Lamoille; Orleans; Washington; Western Addison; Western Chittenden
